title: ChatGPT-Like Large-Scale Foundation Models for Prognostics and Health Management: A Survey and Roadmaps. (arXiv:2305.06472v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: Prognostics and health management (PHM) technology plays a critical role in industrial production and equipment maintenance by identifying and predicting possible equipment failures and damages, thereby allowing necessary maintenance measures to be taken to enhance equipment service life and reliability while reducing production costs and downtime. In recent years, PHM technology based on artificial intelligence (AI) has made remarkable achievements in the context of the industrial IoT and big data, and it is widely used in various industries, such as railway, energy, and aviation, for condition monitoring, fault prediction, and health management. The emergence of large-scale foundation models (LSF-Models) such as ChatGPT and DALLE-E marks the entry of AI into a new era of AI-2.0 from AI-1.0, where deep models have rapidly evolved from a research paradigm of single-modal, single-task, and limited-data to a multi-modal, multi-task, massive data, and super-large model paradigm. translated_title: ChatGPT式的大规模基础模型在预测与健康管理中的应用：综述与路线图
translated_abstract: 预测与健康管理技术在工业生产和设备维护中扮演着至关重要的角色，通过基于人工智能的PHM技术识别和预测设备故障和损坏。现在，基于大规模基础模型（LSF-Models）如ChatGPT和DALLE-E的AI技术，可以实现多模态、多任务、大规模数据和超大模型范式，成为AI-2.0的新时代的标志之一。这种技术广泛应用于各种工业领域，如铁路、能源和航空等，以提高设备的服务寿命和可靠性，同时降低生产成本和停机时间。
tldr: 该论文综述了基于大规模基础模型（LSF-Models）如ChatGPT和DALLE-E的人工智能（AI）技术在预测与健康管理（PHM）中的广泛应用。这种技术可以实现多模态、多任务、大量数据和超大模型范式，成为AI-2.0的新时代的标志之一。
en_tdlr: This paper provides a survey and roadmaps for the use of large-scale foundation models, such as ChatGPT and DALLE-E, in prognostics and health management (PHM) based on artificial intelligence (AI). The technology is widely used in various industries and has rapidly evolved to a multi-modal, multi-task, massive data, and super-large model paradigm, marking the entry of AI-2.0 from AI-1.0.
